title: Latinas in the United States : a historical encyclopedia

BIOGRAPHY & AUTOBIOGRAPHY -- Historical
BIOGRAPHY & AUTOBIOGRAPHY -- Women
Hispanic American women
format: 1 online resource (3 volumes (xx, 885 pages)) : illustrations, maps, portraits.
description: A comprehensive, historical encyclopedia that covers the full range of Latina economic, political, and cultural life in the United States.
